ul.li: Scales And Arpeggi — Learn how to generate scales and arpeggi
Note Pathways — Learn how to create live random walks of pitches
Melodic Profiles — Learn how to generate pitch sequences from breakpoint functions and how to modify them
Granulation — Learn how to granulate a score
Ring And Frequency Modulation — Learn advanced frequential harmonic techniques
Virtual Fundamentals — Learn how to handle virtual fundamentals
Working With Time — Learn how to warp time for your needs
L-systems — Learn how to obtain musical sequences via rule-based generative systems
Fractals — Learn how to obtain fractal-like figures via iterative rewriting
Life On Tonnetz — Play Conway's "Game of Life" on the tonnetz notes
Earthworms — Learn how to build rule-based sequences
